node.title: It's Not You, It's Me
node.description: Our relationship with Christ is strained and we often find that coming to Christ is more and more difficult and we hide from Him just as Adam and Eve did when they sinned. But do we own up to the part we play in the state of our relationship or do we run and hide from the one who loves us most? Sebastien Braxton beautifully presents to us the love relationship between us and God as shown in the Songs of Solomon. A truly heart warming, life changing message.
